amendment.description: To require a National Academy of Sciences study on human exposure to contaminated drinking water at Camp Lejeune, North Carolina.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4349 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4349 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Dole. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6118) To require a National Academy of Sciences study on human exposure to contaminated drinking water at Camp Lejeune, North Carolina.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4349 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Dole.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4349 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
